actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A bill to provide for a council of Oil Importing Nations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the intent of Congress that the President initiate negotiations with other oil importing nations to establish a Council of Oil Importing Nations to negotiate for reasonable oil prices with the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries. Directs the President to submit to such Council a set of appropriate sanctions to encourage compliance with negotiated oil prices.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a council of Oil Importing Nations, and for other purposes.
